prvtRapsMIB.name: prvtRapsMIB

revisions.description: Added description for rings and subrings.

prvtRapsMIB.contactinfo: BATM/Telco Systems Support team Email: For North America: techsupport@telco.com For North Europe: support@batm.de, info@batm.de For the rest of the world: techsupport@telco.com
prvtRapsMIB.description: The SNMP MIB module for Ring Automatic Protection Switching (G.8032).

PrvtRapsMepIdType.name: PrvtRapsMepIdType
PrvtRapsMepIdType.description: A maintenance entity group end point identifier.

PrvtRapsHoldOffType.name: PrvtRapsHoldOffType
PrvtRapsHoldOffType.description: Hold-off timer value in milliseconds. Valid values are increments of 100 milliseconds.

PrvtRapsWaitTimerType.name: PrvtRapsWaitTimerType
PrvtRapsWaitTimerType.description: Wait to Restore timer value in minutes.

PrvtRapsGuardTimerType.name: PrvtRapsGuardTimerType
PrvtRapsGuardTimerType.description: Guard timer value in milliseconds. Valid values are increments of 10 milliseconds.

PrvtRapsBlockTimerType.name: PrvtRapsBlockTimerType
PrvtRapsBlockTimerType.description: Wait to Block timer value in milliseconds. This time is actually the Guard Timer + 5 seconds.

PrvtRapsRoleType.name: PrvtRapsRoleType
PrvtRapsRoleType.description: The role of a node inside a ring.

PrvtRapsReceivedCommandType.name: PrvtRapsReceivedCommandType
PrvtRapsReceivedCommandType.description: Request/State field of received R-APS message.

PrvtRapsReceivedInfoType.name: PrvtRapsReceivedInfoType
PrvtRapsReceivedInfoType.description: Bits field of received R-APS message.

PrvtRapsTopPriCmdType.name: PrvtRapsTopPriCmdType
PrvtRapsTopPriCmdType.description: Top Priority Request and Status Values.

PrvtRapsActionType.name: PrvtRapsActionType
PrvtRapsActionType.description: Used to perform an action. Setting to 'performAction' will cause the action to be performed. Setting to 'idle' (or any other value except 'performAction') has no effect (no action is performed). Reads will always return 'idle'.

PrvtRapsIfIndexOrAgIdType.name: PrvtRapsIfIndexOrAgIdType
PrvtRapsIfIndexOrAgIdType.description: The ifIndex of a physical port or the ID of a LAG interface. LAG interfaces have values 1..14. Physical ports (ifIndex) have values > 1000.

prvtRapsInstTable.name: prvtRapsInstTable
prvtRapsInstTable.description: R-APS Instance table. Each entry in this table defines an instance of a Ring APS.

prvtRapsInstIndex.name: prvtRapsInstIndex
prvtRapsInstIndex.description: An arbitrary index uniquely identifying a Ring APS instance.

prvtRapsInstRowStatus.name: prvtRapsInstRowStatus
prvtRapsInstRowStatus.description: The RowStatus for this R-APS instance.

prvtRapsInstMode.name: prvtRapsInstMode
prvtRapsInstMode.description: The G.8032 mode for this R-APS instance. Only applicable when main ring's control protocol is raps (prvtRapsInstControlProtocol equals 'raps'). In version 1 mode (prvtRapsInstMode equals 'version1'), ring ID (prvtRapsInstRingId) must be 1.

prvtRapsInstRingId.name: prvtRapsInstRingId
prvtRapsInstRingId.description: The Ring ID for this R-APS instance. Only applicable when main ring's control protocol is raps (prvtRapsInstControlProtocol equals 'raps'). In version 1 mode (prvtRapsInstMode equals 'version1'), ring ID (prvtRapsInstRingId) must be 1.

prvtRapsInstRole.name: prvtRapsInstRole
prvtRapsInstRole.description: The role of the node for this R-APS instance. Must perform shutdown to change this object.

prvtRapsInstControlVlan.name: prvtRapsInstControlVlan
prvtRapsInstControlVlan.description: The control VLAN for this R-APS instance. When main ring's control protocol is vpls (prvtRapsInstControlProtocol equals 'vpls'), this should be set equal to the ring's instance ID (prvtRapsInstIndex). This object must be set to the ID of an existing VLAN. Each R-APS instance must use a unique VLAN for the control VLAN. Must perform shutdown to change this object.

prvtRapsInstCfmDomainLevel.name: prvtRapsInstCfmDomainLevel
prvtRapsInstCfmDomainLevel.description: The CFM domain level for this R-APS instance. Must perform shutdown to change this object.

prvtRapsInstRevertiveMode.name: prvtRapsInstRevertiveMode
prvtRapsInstRevertiveMode.description: Set to 'true' to select revertive behavior for this R-APS instance. Only applicable when main ring's control protocol is raps (prvtRapsInstControlProtocol equals 'raps'). Non-revertive behavior is not available in version 1 mode.

prvtRapsInstDisableVirtChan.name: prvtRapsInstDisableVirtChan
prvtRapsInstDisableVirtChan.description: Set to 'true' to select that the node is part of a sub-ring without a RAPS virtual channel. Only applicable when main ring's control protocol is raps (prvtRapsInstControlProtocol equals 'raps'). Must be set 'false' when in version 1 mode.

prvtRapsInstHoldOffTimer.name: prvtRapsInstHoldOffTimer
prvtRapsInstHoldOffTimer.description: The hold-off timer time-out value for this R-APS instance. Only applicable when main ring's control protocol is raps (prvtRapsInstControlProtocol equals 'raps').

prvtRapsInstWaitToRestoreTimer.name: prvtRapsInstWaitToRestoreTimer
prvtRapsInstWaitToRestoreTimer.description: The wait-to-restore timer time-out value for this R-APS instance. Only applicable when main ring's control protocol is raps (prvtRapsInstControlProtocol equals 'raps').

prvtRapsInstGuardTimer.name: prvtRapsInstGuardTimer
prvtRapsInstGuardTimer.description: The guard timer time-out value for this R-APS instance. Only applicable when main ring's control protocol is raps (prvtRapsInstControlProtocol equals 'raps').

prvtRapsInstWaitToBlockTimer.name: prvtRapsInstWaitToBlockTimer
prvtRapsInstWaitToBlockTimer.description: The wait to block timer time-out value for this sub-ring.

prvtRapsInstShutdown.name: prvtRapsInstShutdown
prvtRapsInstShutdown.description: Set to 'true' to de-activate this R-APS instance.

prvtRapsInstClear.name: prvtRapsInstClear
prvtRapsInstClear.description: Sends the Clear command to this R-APS instance.

prvtRapsInstOperStatus.name: prvtRapsInstOperStatus
prvtRapsInstOperStatus.description: The operational status of this R-APS instance.

prvtRapsInstRapsState.name: prvtRapsInstRapsState
prvtRapsInstRapsState.description: The current state for this R-APS instance.

prvtRapsInstTopPriCmd.name: prvtRapsInstTopPriCmd
prvtRapsInstTopPriCmd.description: The received Top Priority Request and Status value for this R-APS instance.

prvtRapsInstControlProtocol.name: prvtRapsInstControlProtocol
prvtRapsInstControlProtocol.description: The protocol that controls the main ring.

prvtRapsInstMonVlanTable.name: prvtRapsInstMonVlanTable
prvtRapsInstMonVlanTable.description: Monitor VLAN Table Each entry in this table defines a VLAN that will be monitored. Only applicable when main ring's control protocol is raps (prvtRapsInstControlProtocol equals 'raps').

prvtRapsInstMonVlanId.name: prvtRapsInstMonVlanId
prvtRapsInstMonVlanId.description: Uniquely identifies a VLAN to be monitored. This object must be the ID of an existing VLAN. Must not be the same VLAN as the control VLAN (prvtRapsInstControlVlan).

prvtRapsInstMonVlanRowStatus.name: prvtRapsInstMonVlanRowStatus
prvtRapsInstMonVlanRowStatus.description: The RowStatus for this monitored VLAN.

prvtRapsInstRingPortTable.name: prvtRapsInstRingPortTable
prvtRapsInstRingPortTable.description: R-APS Instance Ring Port Table. Each entry in this table defines a port belonging to a R-APS instance. Only applicable when main ring's control protocol is raps (prvtRapsInstControlProtocol equals 'raps'). Exactly two interfaces must be defined per instance. This includes physical ports (defined in prvtRapsInstRingPortTable) and LAG interfaces (defined in prvtRapsInstRingLagTable). In the case when one physical port and one LAG interface is used, the two port index values must be unique (i.e. prvtRapsInstRingPortIndex must not equal prvtRapsInstRingLagIndex)

prvtRapsInstRingPortIndex.name: prvtRapsInstRingPortIndex
prvtRapsInstRingPortIndex.description: An arbitrary index uniquely identifying a physical port belonging to a R-APS instance. When a physical port and a LAG port are used in the same R-APS instance, the two ports must use unique index values (i.e. prvtRapsInstRingPortIndex must not equal prvtRapsInstRingLagIndex).

prvtRapsInstRingPortRowStatus.name: prvtRapsInstRingPortRowStatus
prvtRapsInstRingPortRowStatus.description: The RowStatus for this ring port.

prvtRapsInstRingPortIfIndex.name: prvtRapsInstRingPortIfIndex
prvtRapsInstRingPortIfIndex.description: The ifIndex of the physical port assigned to this ring port. No two ports within the same ring instance can use the same physical port.

prvtRapsInstRingPortMep.name: prvtRapsInstRingPortMep
prvtRapsInstRingPortMep.description: The peer maintenance entity group end point ID that should monitor this ring port. No two ports within the same ring instance can use the same MEP ID.

prvtRapsInstRingPortRpl.name: prvtRapsInstRingPortRpl
prvtRapsInstRingPortRpl.description: Set to 'true' to define this ring port as a Ring Protection Link port. Exactly one RPL port must be defined when ring role (prvtRapsInstRole) is not 'simpleNode'. In 'simpleNode' role, no RPL ports must be defined.

prvtRapsInstRingPortManSwitch.name: prvtRapsInstRingPortManSwitch
prvtRapsInstRingPortManSwitch.description: Send the Manual Switch command to this ring port.

prvtRapsInstRingPortForcedSwitch.name: prvtRapsInstRingPortForcedSwitch
prvtRapsInstRingPortForcedSwitch.description: Send the Forced Switch command to this ring port.

prvtRapsInstRingLagTable.name: prvtRapsInstRingLagTable
prvtRapsInstRingLagTable.description: R-APS Instance Ring LAG Table Each entry in this table defines a Link Aggregation Group interface belonging to a R-APS instance. Only applicable when main ring's control protocol is raps (prvtRapsInstControlProtocol equals 'raps'). Exactly two interfaces must be defined per instance. This includes physical ports (defined in prvtRapsInstRingPortTable) and LAG interfaces (defined in prvtRapsInstRingLagTable).

prvtRapsInstRingLagIndex.name: prvtRapsInstRingLagIndex
prvtRapsInstRingLagIndex.description: An arbitrary index uniquely identifying a LAG interface belonging to a R-APS instance. When a physical port and a LAG port are used in the same R-APS instance, the two ports must use unique index values (i.e. prvtRapsInstRingPortIndex must not equal prvtRapsInstRingLagIndex).

prvtRapsInstRingLagRowStatus.name: prvtRapsInstRingLagRowStatus
prvtRapsInstRingLagRowStatus.description: The RowStatus for this LAG interface.

prvtRapsInstRingLagId.name: prvtRapsInstRingLagId
prvtRapsInstRingLagId.description: The ID of a LAG interface belonging to a R-APS instance. This object must be set to the ID of an existing LAG interface. No two LAG ports within the same ring instance can use the same LAG port.

prvtRapsInstRingLagMep.name: prvtRapsInstRingLagMep
prvtRapsInstRingLagMep.description: The peer maintenance entity group end point ID that should monitor this LAG interface. No two LAG ports within the same ring instance can use the same MEP ID.

prvtRapsInstRingLagRpl.name: prvtRapsInstRingLagRpl
prvtRapsInstRingLagRpl.description: Set to 'true' to define this ring LAG port as a Ring Protection Link port. Exactly one RPL port must be defined when ring role (prvtRapsInstRole) is not 'simpleNode'. In 'simpleNode' role, no RPL ports must be defined.

prvtRapsInstRingLagManSwitch.name: prvtRapsInstRingLagManSwitch
prvtRapsInstRingLagManSwitch.description: Send the Manual Switch command to this LAG interface.

prvtRapsInstRingLagForcedSwitch.name: prvtRapsInstRingLagForcedSwitch
prvtRapsInstRingLagForcedSwitch.description: Send the Forced Switch command to this LAG interface.

prvtRapsInstPortStatusTable.name: prvtRapsInstPortStatusTable
prvtRapsInstPortStatusTable.description: R-APS Instance Port Status Table Each entry in this table gives status information concerning a particular port (physical port or LAG interface port) belonging to a R-APS instance.

prvtRapsInstPortStatusIfIndex.name: prvtRapsInstPortStatusIfIndex
prvtRapsInstPortStatusIfIndex.description: Uniquely identifies a physical port (ifIndex) or a LAG port (LAG ID) belonging to a R-APS instance.

prvtRapsInstPortStatusLink.name: prvtRapsInstPortStatusLink
prvtRapsInstPortStatusLink.description: The operational status of this port.

prvtRapsInstPortStatusRemoteMep.name: prvtRapsInstPortStatusRemoteMep
prvtRapsInstPortStatusRemoteMep.description: The maintenance entity group end point ID for the remote port connected to this port.

prvtRapsInstPortStatusRcvdNodeId.name: prvtRapsInstPortStatusRcvdNodeId
prvtRapsInstPortStatusRcvdNodeId.description: The MAC address of the remote R-APS device connected to this port.

prvtRapsInstPortStatusRcvdCmd.name: prvtRapsInstPortStatusRcvdCmd
prvtRapsInstPortStatusRcvdCmd.description: The command received on this port.

prvtRapsInstPortStatusRcvdInfo.name: prvtRapsInstPortStatusRcvdInfo
prvtRapsInstPortStatusRcvdInfo.description: The info received on this port.

prvtRapsInstSubRingTable.name: prvtRapsInstSubRingTable
prvtRapsInstSubRingTable.description: R-APS Instance Sub-ring Table Each entry in this table defines a sub-ring belonging to a R-APS instance. Sub-rings are not available in version 1 mode.

prvtRapsInstSubRingIndex.name: prvtRapsInstSubRingIndex
prvtRapsInstSubRingIndex.description: An arbitrary index uniquely identifying a sub-ring for this R-APS instance.

prvtRapsInstSubRingId.name: prvtRapsInstSubRingId
prvtRapsInstSubRingId.description: The ring ID for this sub-ring.

prvtRapsInstSubRingRole.name: prvtRapsInstSubRingRole
prvtRapsInstSubRingRole.description: The role of the node inside this sub-ring. Must perform shutdown to change this object.

prvtRapsInstSubRingVirtChanVlan.name: prvtRapsInstSubRingVirtChanVlan
prvtRapsInstSubRingVirtChanVlan.description: Configures the virtual channel VLAN for this sub-ring. Only applicable when main ring's control protocol is raps (prvtRapsInstControlProtocol equals 'raps'). Must be a VLAN from the prvtRapsInstMonVlanTable. No two sub-rings can use the same VLAN for the virtual channel VLAN.

prvtRapsInstSubRingRevertiveMode.name: prvtRapsInstSubRingRevertiveMode
prvtRapsInstSubRingRevertiveMode.description: Set to 'true' to select revertive behavior for this sub-ring.

prvtRapsInstSubRingHoldOffTimer.name: prvtRapsInstSubRingHoldOffTimer
prvtRapsInstSubRingHoldOffTimer.description: The hold-off timer time-out value for this sub-ring.

prvtRapsInstSubRingWaitTimer.name: prvtRapsInstSubRingWaitTimer
prvtRapsInstSubRingWaitTimer.description: The wait-to-restore timer time-out value for this sub-ring.

prvtRapsInstSubRingGuardTimer.name: prvtRapsInstSubRingGuardTimer
prvtRapsInstSubRingGuardTimer.description: The guard timer time-out value for this sub-ring.

prvtRapsInstSubRingBlockTimer.name: prvtRapsInstSubRingBlockTimer
prvtRapsInstSubRingBlockTimer.description: The wait to block timer time-out value for this sub-ring.

prvtRapsInstSubRingPropTopChng.name: prvtRapsInstSubRingPropTopChng
prvtRapsInstSubRingPropTopChng.description: Set to 'true' to enable topology change propagation for this sub-ring.

prvtRapsInstSubRingShutdown.name: prvtRapsInstSubRingShutdown
prvtRapsInstSubRingShutdown.description: Set to 'true' to de-activate this sub-ring.

prvtRapsInstSubRingClear.name: prvtRapsInstSubRingClear
prvtRapsInstSubRingClear.description: Send the Clear command to this sub-ring.

prvtRapsInstSubRingManualSwitch.name: prvtRapsInstSubRingManualSwitch
prvtRapsInstSubRingManualSwitch.description: Send the Manual Switch command to this sub-ring.

prvtRapsInstSubRingForcedSwitch.name: prvtRapsInstSubRingForcedSwitch
prvtRapsInstSubRingForcedSwitch.description: Send the Forced Switch command to this sub-ring.

prvtRapsInstSubRingOperStatus.name: prvtRapsInstSubRingOperStatus
prvtRapsInstSubRingOperStatus.description: The operational status of this sub-ring.

prvtRapsInstSubRingRapsState.name: prvtRapsInstSubRingRapsState
prvtRapsInstSubRingRapsState.description: The current state of this sub-ring.

prvtRapsInstSubRingTopPriCmd.name: prvtRapsInstSubRingTopPriCmd
prvtRapsInstSubRingTopPriCmd.description: The received Top Priority Request and Status value for this sub-ring.

prvtRapsInstSubRingPortName.name: prvtRapsInstSubRingPortName
prvtRapsInstSubRingPortName.description: The textual name of the port belonging to this sub-ring. For a physical port, the format is U/S/P. For a LAG interface, the format is agX.

prvtRapsInstSubRingLinkStatus.name: prvtRapsInstSubRingLinkStatus
prvtRapsInstSubRingLinkStatus.description: The operational status of the port belonging to this sub-ring.

prvtRapsInstSubRingRcvdNodeId.name: prvtRapsInstSubRingRcvdNodeId
prvtRapsInstSubRingRcvdNodeId.description: The MAC address of the remote R-APS device connected to the port belonging to this sub-ring.

prvtRapsInstSubRingRcvdCmd.name: prvtRapsInstSubRingRcvdCmd
prvtRapsInstSubRingRcvdCmd.description: The command received on the port belonging to this sub-ring.

prvtRapsInstSubRingRcvdInfo.name: prvtRapsInstSubRingRcvdInfo
prvtRapsInstSubRingRcvdInfo.description: The info received on the port belonging to this sub-ring.

prvtRapsInstSubRingVcRcvdNodeId.name: prvtRapsInstSubRingVcRcvdNodeId
prvtRapsInstSubRingVcRcvdNodeId.description: The MAC address of the remote R-APS device connected through the virtual channel.

prvtRapsInstSubRingVcRcvdCmd.name: prvtRapsInstSubRingVcRcvdCmd
prvtRapsInstSubRingVcRcvdCmd.description: The command received through the virtual channel belonging to this sub-ring.

prvtRapsInstSubRingVcRcvdInfo.name: prvtRapsInstSubRingVcRcvdInfo
prvtRapsInstSubRingVcRcvdInfo.description: The info received through the virtual channel belonging to this sub-ring.

prvtRapsInstSubRingVirtChanSvc.name: prvtRapsInstSubRingVirtChanSvc
prvtRapsInstSubRingVirtChanSvc.description: Configure the virtual channel service for this sub-ring. Only applicable when main ring's control protocol is vpls (prvtRapsInstControlProtocol equals 'vpls'). Must be a service ID from PRVT-SERV-MIB::serviceId. No two sub-rings can use the same service ID for the virtual channel service.

prvtRapsInstSubRingControlVlan.name: prvtRapsInstSubRingControlVlan
prvtRapsInstSubRingControlVlan.description: The control VLAN for this sub-ring. This object must be set to the ID of an existing VLAN. Must not be the same VLAN as a monitored VLAN in any instance. Must perform shutdown to change this object.

prvtRapsInstSubRingPortTable.name: prvtRapsInstSubRingPortTable
prvtRapsInstSubRingPortTable.description: R-APS Instance Sub-ring port Table An entry in this table defines a physical port belonging to a sub-ring. Exactly one interface must be defined per sub-ring. This includes physical ports (defined in prvtRapsInstSubRingPortTable) and LAG interfaces (defined in prvtRapsInstSubRingLagTable). A sub-ring port can not be part of the main ring.

prvtRapsInstSubRingPortRowStatus.name: prvtRapsInstSubRingPortRowStatus
prvtRapsInstSubRingPortRowStatus.description: The RowStatus for this sub-ring port.

prvtRapsInstSubRingPortMep.name: prvtRapsInstSubRingPortMep
prvtRapsInstSubRingPortMep.description: The peer maintenance entity group end point ID that should monitor this sub-ring port. A sub-ring MEP can not be used in another ring.

prvtRapsInstSubRingPortRpl.name: prvtRapsInstSubRingPortRpl
prvtRapsInstSubRingPortRpl.description: Set to 'true' to define this sub-ring port as a Ring Protection Link port. Exactly one RPL port must be defined when sub-ring role (prvtRapsInstSubRingRole) is not 'simpleNode'. In 'simpleNode' role, no RPL ports must be defined.

prvtRapsInstSubRingLagTable.name: prvtRapsInstSubRingLagTable
prvtRapsInstSubRingLagTable.description: R-APS Instance Sub-ring LAG interface Table An entry in this table defines a LAG interface belonging to a sub-ring. Exactly one interface must be defined per sub-ring. This includes physical ports (defined in prvtRapsInstSubRingPortTable) and LAG interfaces (defined in prvtRapsInstSubRingLagTable).

prvtRapsInstSubRingLagId.name: prvtRapsInstSubRingLagId
prvtRapsInstSubRingLagId.description: Uniquely identifies a LAG interface belonging to a sub-ring. Must be set to the LAG ID of an existing LAG interface. A sub-ring LAG port can not be part of the main ring.

prvtRapsInstSubRingLagRowStatus.name: prvtRapsInstSubRingLagRowStatus
prvtRapsInstSubRingLagRowStatus.description: The RowStatus for this sub-ring LAG interface.

prvtRapsInstSubRingLagMep.name: prvtRapsInstSubRingLagMep
prvtRapsInstSubRingLagMep.description: The peer maintenance entity group end point ID that should monitor this sub-ring LAG interface. A sub-ring MEP can not be used in another ring.

prvtRapsInstSubRingLagRpl.name: prvtRapsInstSubRingLagRpl
prvtRapsInstSubRingLagRpl.description: Set to 'true' to define this sub-ring LAG port as a Ring Protection Link port. Exactly one RPL port must be defined when sub-ring role (prvtRapsInstSubRingRole) is not 'simpleNode'. In 'simpleNode' role, no RPL ports must be defined.

prvtRapsDefectAlarm.name: prvtRapsDefectAlarm
prvtRapsDefectAlarm.description: This trap will be sent by any instance when it notices a defect. So far only the situation when two or more RPL-owners are defined in the ring is identified as a defect. This scenario is noticed when the instance with the RPL-Owner role receives a RAPS packet with the RB bit set in its status field from a different NodeID than its own. The management entity receiving the notification can identify the system from the network source address of the notification.

prvtRapsSwitchoverAlarm.name: prvtRapsSwitchoverAlarm
prvtRapsSwitchoverAlarm.description: This trap will be sent by any instance when it changes state. The management entity receiving the notification can identify the system from the network source address of the notification

prvtRapsInstSubRingDefectAlarm.name: prvtRapsInstSubRingDefectAlarm
prvtRapsInstSubRingDefectAlarm.description: This trap will be sent by any subring instance when it notices a defect. So far only the situation when two or more RPL-owners are defined in the ring is identified as a defect. This scenario is noticed when the instance with the RPL-Owner role receives a RAPS packet with the RB bit set in its status field from a different NodeID than its own. The management entity receiving the notification can identify the system from the network source address of the notification, and can identify the instance reporting the change by the indices in the OID of the prvtRapsInstSubRingOperStatus variable in the notification.

prvtRapsInstSubRingSwitchoverAlarm.name: prvtRapsInstSubRingSwitchoverAlarm
prvtRapsInstSubRingSwitchoverAlarm.description: This trap will be sent by any subring instance when it changes state. The management entity receiving the notification can identify the system from the network source address of the notification, and can identify the instance reporting the change by the indices in the OID of the prvtRapsInstSubRingRapsState variable in the notification.
